member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Controllers.ContentEditorManager.RemoveEmptyPaneClass
member.summary: remove default empty pane class as some skin have special style on it and it may caught style issues with content editor feature, then we use a new style to cover it.

member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Controllers.ILocalizationController.GetLocalizedDictionary(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a dictionary of localized key for a resource file for a given culture
member.param: The relative file path of the main resource file, e.g. ~/DesktopModules/SocialLibrary/App_LocalResources/CmxResources.resx
The culture for which this dictionay is requested
member.remarks: This API does not fallback to any other DNN resource files.

member.name: T:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Helpers.PageSecurityHelper
member.summary: This class offers some common methods to work with pages and their permission

member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Helpers.PageSecurityHelper.IsPageEditor(System.Int32,DotNetNuke.Entities.Portals.PortalSettings)
member.summary: Checks if current user is page editor of the passed tab
member.param: Portal Settings related with the portal which contains the tab
member.returns: Returns true if current user has a edit permission on the page or is admin of some module in the page. Otherwise, returns false

member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Helpers.PageSecurityHelper.IsPageAdmin
member.summary: Checks if current user is page admin of the currentpage
member.returns: Returns true if current user has any admin permission. Otherwise returns false

member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Helpers.PageSecurityHelper.IsModuleAdmin(DotNetNuke.Entities.Portals.PortalSettings)
member.summary: Check if current user is Module admin of any module in the current page
member.param: Portal Settings related with the portal which contains the tab
member.returns: Returns true if current user has admin permission over some module in the current page. Otherwise, returns false

member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Helpers.PageSecurityHelper.IsModuleAdmin(DotNetNuke.Entities.Portals.PortalSettings,DotNetNuke.Entities.Tabs.TabInfo)
member.summary: Check if current user is Module admin of any module in the passed page
member.param: Portal Settings related with the portal which contains the tab
member.returns: Returns true if current user has admin permission over some module in the passed page. Otherwise, returns false

member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.UI.Services.LocalizationController.GetTable(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a list of CMX related Localization Keys with it's values for the current culture.
